title: I've heard scarier stories told by 6-year olds around a campfire.
review: Go and see this at the $1.00 theatre if you must, but be warned that it is a 1-1/2 hour buildup for one (mildly) creepy final scene.If you enjoyed the 'Hook on the Car Door' story or reciting 'Bloody Mary' in front of the bathroom mirror -- then you might be scared, but no one over the age of 14 would be.
